channel.title: Copyright?
channel.description: Hey I know I've made a simular question before but I am quite worried about copyright. If you own a private server (or even play them) isn't there a chance of getting sued or anything because its Jagex's code?

item.title: Copyright?
item.dc:creator: @Brad_J Brad J
item.description:
@Brad_J wrote:

[quote=“The Real Java, post:8, topic:20253”]ok first off it’s your own oppinion wether you like Mopar better than RS2, alot of people who have private servers still go on RS2 ALOT more then Mopar.

And MoparScape is NOT illegal, RuneScape just send SOME parts of the source to Mopar for Java development.[/quote]

Ok thanks (again) for clearing that up, I can play in peace now.

Read full topic

item.title: Copyright?
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Java The Real Java
item.description:
@The_Real_Java wrote:

ok first off it’s your own oppinion wether you like Mopar better than RS2, alot of people who have private servers still go on RS2 ALOT more then Mopar.

And MoparScape is NOT illegal, RuneScape just send SOME parts of the source to Mopar for Java development.

item.title: Copyright?
item.dc:creator: @Brad_J Brad J
item.description:
@Brad_J wrote:

[quote=“billysmither, post:6, topic:20253”][quote author=Brad J link=topic=30753.msg356139#msg356139 date=1161984321]

doubt it moparscape basically owns runescape soon eveyone will quit runescape and everyone will play private servers! so no they wont

Lol MoparScape won’t get that good, still any other answers as I need to be certain.
[/quote]

Moparscape is already better than runescape. i dont really care what you all think but i think it is! :D[/quote]

Lol yea but they won’t own RuneScape, anyway anyone got anymore answers?

Read full topic
